onboardingSubTitleFirst: Record everything you eat and track your results
loginNote: Log in or create an account
enterEmailReceiveLink: Enter your email below to receive a link to reset your password.
enterCodeSentByEmail: For security reasons, enter the code we sent you by email below
createNewPassword: Create a new password to regain access to your account
tellYourGender: To personalize your experience, please tell us your gender:
whatsYourBirthDate: What is your date of birth?
yourAgeHelpReferences: Your age helps us personalize recommendations based on your life stage and metabolic needs.
yourHeightHelpCalculateMass: Your height helps us calculate your body mass index (BMI).
knowingYourCurrentWeightHelpGoals: Knowing your current weight allows us to set realistic goals and track your progress more accurately.
goalWeightDescription: What weight would you like to achieve? Selecting a goal helps us create personalized plans for you.
haveAnyMedicalConditions: Do you have any medical conditions?
newJourney: This is a new journey. Get ready to be healthier and happier with yourself.
